name: Mahjong - Adventure In London Deluxe Quest
name_original: Mahjong - Adventure In London Deluxe Quest
description:
An exciting game of mahjong will help you have an interesting time. This game has many levels, which at first glance seem very easy, but in order to pass them you should be alert and focused, have the skills of strategy and calculations. Good luck!

FEATURES:
- Over 100 Original Levels
- New Daily Boards
- Many different layouts will train your mind
- Detailed Game statistics
- Awesome Chinese songs
- Days of fun
